GV05isup___u:2: īśā vāsyam idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiñca jagatyāṃ jagat /
GV05isup___u:3: tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya sviddhanam // IsUp_1 //
GV05isup___u:5: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare // IsUp_2 //
GV05isup___u:6: asuryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ /
GV05isup___u:7: tāṃste pretyābhigacchanti ye ke cātmahano janāḥ // IsUp_3 //
GV05isup___u:8: anejad ekaṃ manaso javīyo nainaddevā āpnuvanpūrvamarṣat /
GV05isup___u:9: taddhāvato 'nyānatyeti tiṣṭhat tasminn apo mātariśvā dadhāti // IsUp_4 //
GV05isup___u:10: tad ejati tan naijati tad dūre tad v antike /
GV05isup___u:11: tad antar asya sarvasya tad u sarvasyāsya bāhyataḥ // IsUp_5 //
GV05isup___u:12: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmany evānupaśyati /
GV05isup___u:13: sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ tato na vijugupsate // IsUp_6 //
GV05isup___u:15: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ // IsUp_7 //
GV05isup___u:16: sa paryagāc chukram akāyam avraṇam asnāviraṃ śuddham apāpaviddham /
GV05isup___u:17: kavir manīṣī paribhūḥ svayambhūr yāthātathyator 'thān vyadadhāc chāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ // IsUp_8 //
GV05isup___u:19: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya uvidyāyāṃ ratāḥ // IsUp_9 //
GV05isup___u:20: anyad evāhur vidyayān yad āhur avidyayā /
GV05isup___u:21: iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire // IsUp_10 //
GV05isup___u:22: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha /
GV05isup___u:23: avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtam aśnute // IsUp_11 //
GV05isup___u:25: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u sambhūtyāṃ ratāḥ // IsUp_12 //
GV05isup___u:26: anyad evāhuḥ saṃbhavād anyad āhur asaṃbhavāt /
GV05isup___u:27: iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire // IsUp_13 //
GV05isup___u:28: saṃbhūtiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha /
GV05isup___u:29: vināśena mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā saṃbhūtyāmṛtam aśnute // IsUp_14 //
GV05isup___u:31: tat tvaṃ pūṣann apāvṛṇu satyadharmāya dṛṣṭaye // IsUp_15 //
GV05isup___u:32: pūṣann ekarṣe yama sūrya prājāpatya vyūha raśmīn samūha tejaḥ /
GV05isup___u:33: yat te rūpaṃ kalyāṇatamaṃ tat te paśyāmi yo 'sāv asau puruṣaḥ so 'ham asmi // IsUp_16 //
GV05isup___u:34: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntaṃ śarīram /
GV05isup___u:35: oṃ krato smara kṛtaṃ smara krato smara kṛtaṃ smara // IsUp_17 //
GV05isup___u:36: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV05isup___u:37: yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te nama uktiṃ vidhema // IsUp_18 //
